name: 陳孝行
objective: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對物化處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括化學反應動力學、高等氧化還原程序、薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序等之應用。
schedule:
Week　　Contents
1　　Introduction
2　　Fundamentals of Chemical Reaction -Thermodynamics
3　　Fundamentals of Chemical Reaction -Kinetics
4-5　　Fundamentals of Chemical Reaction -Acid base chemistry, solubility
6　　Equilibrium Software-Mineql+
7　　Midterm #1
8-9　　Reactor analysis
-Batch and continuous flow reactors
-Plug flow and completely mixed reactors
10-12　　Membrane Filtration (RO, NF, UF, MF)
13　　Midterm #2
14-16　　Chemical Oxidation and Reduction
17　　Disinfection/Oxidation byproducts
18　　Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Mid term twice　　20 %, 20 %
Final examination　　20 %
Homework　　          20 %
Report and presentation　　20 %
materials:
Textbook：

(2)　　Water Chemistry, Snoeyink and Jenkins, 1982。
Reference:
Chemistry for Environmental Engineering, by C.N. Sawyer, P. L. McCarty, and G. F. Parkin, McGraw-Hill, Fifth Edition, 2002.
